text: Protecting 50% would not be the world's greatest vaccine, but would be a good start till something better is developed. Could use as 'prime boost'. FDA to require covid-19 vaccine to prevent disease in 50 percent of recipients to win approval https://t.co/fl9XSnGT4K

urls.title: FDA to require covid-19 vaccine to prevent disease in 50 percent of recipients to win approval
urls.description: The Food and Drug Administration said Tuesday any covid-19 vaccine, to be approved, will have to prevent disease or decrease its severity in at least 50 percent of the people who are vaccinated.
